amendment.description: To strike the deduction relating to income attributable to United States production activities and the international tax provisions and allow a credit for manufacturing wages, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3112 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 22 - 77. Record Vote Number: 82.

action.text: Amendment SA 3112 proposed by Senator Graham FL. (consideration: CR S4793) To strike the deduction relating to income attributable to United States production activities and the international tax provisions and allow a credit for manufacturing wages, and for other purposes.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3112 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 22 - 77. Record Vote Number: 82.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3112 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 22 - 77. Record Vote Number: 82.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3112 proposed by Senator Graham FL.
